text: Xanthe Ryder (15 May 1926 - 1 January 1998) was a British alpine skier. She competed in two events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1998 deaths Category:British female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Great Britain Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Xanthe Ryder
